inn1.comm: short of length ball just outside off, squeezed towards third man for a single
short and very wide, Dilshan chases after it and misses
full and wide, Dilshan steps forward and carves that through cover, in the air and in the gap
pushed towards cover this time
beaten outside off, short of a length and angling away, Dilshan pokes at it and misses
short of length and outside off, left alone
length ball pitching on leg stump, slanting down, Dilshan looks to work it away but is struck on the pads, the ball rolls towards point
back of a length and moving away a hint, left alone by Tharanga
worked down towards fine leg for a single
length ball on the pads, easily helped down to fine leg for four, not the best line from Irfan
fuller this time, Irfan gets it to move in a touch, Dilshan taps it towards wide mid-on
length ball outside off, Dilshan flays at that and hits it towards backward point
back of length ball on middle stump, defended back towards the bowler
outside off, Tharanga shoulders arms
closer to the pads, nudged towards square leg, no alarming movement for Zaheer or Irfan so far
well outside off and that is left alone once more
back of length ball nips in, bounces more than Tharanga expects and he can't get bat on it, off the thigh pad for a leg bye to short third man
Dilshan is struck on the pad as he looks to work the ball towards square leg
short of length and outside off, uppishly played past backward point, wide of the fielder though and Dilshan picks up another boundary
a misfield allows Tharanga a single, a crisp drive towards mid-off where Ashwin fumbles
whips this length ball towards square leg
swinging in towards the pads, it was too full from Irfan, Dilshan guides it down towards fine leg

short of length ball and outside off, too wide from Irfan, especially to a batsman who is very strong on the cut, Tharanga hammers that towards point, Tiwary gets a hand on it but can't stop the ball completely
a hint of swing in, short of length ball, Dilshan inside-edges onto the pad
and this time Dilshan is beaten, the ball holds its line, it was short of length and bounced more than Dilshan expected, he was moving forward when trying to play that, past the outside edge
jags away after pitching outside off, Tharanga flirts with it and misses
well wide of off stump
nearly gets the edge there, Tharanga isn't looking too solid here, he wanted to drive that on the up, didn't get forward enough as he played that, beaten

Tharanga defends towards square leg, Rohit fields and chucks the ball through his legs to a fielder behind him, except the fielder there has moved away from where Rohit thought he was, the batsmen jog a single, India protest that the ball was dead, and Tharanga has to go back
defended back towards the bowler
way outside off , and that's another wide
another swing and a miss from Tharanga, he's not too far away from getting an edge
outside edge down to third man, and Tharanga will be happy to have survived that Zaheer over
an appeal for lbw, umpire turns it down correctly as there is a thick inside-edge
back of length and punched to cover
pitched up and on the pads, pushed towards mid-on for a single
length ball on middle, tapped back towards the bowler
length ball on middle and leg, pushed to the right of Irfan, Dilshan took a few paces down the track but Irfan fielded that and shies at the stumps, forcing Dilshan back
pitched up and wide, Dilshan gets the room to swing his arms, muscles that past a diving cover fielder for four
length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
inside-edged towards mid-on, a sharp single is taken
length ball on the pads, Dilshan looks to work that away to the leg side, inside-edged on to the pads, the ball dribbles towards point
pitched up and on middle and off, guided towards backward point
length ball that Dilshan looks to thrash through the off side, mistimed towards mid-off
ooh, Dilshan french-cuts that to fine leg for four, it was a full ball that Dilshan wanted to drive, gets a thick inside-edge instead, and the ball scoots past leg stump
length ball on middle and off, defended towards mid-on
length ball outside off, pushed back towards the bowler
Tharanga beaten outside off as he ends up playing inside the line of a short of length ball outside off, he 's had a few plays-and-misses today
worked towards square leg for a couple
an ugly stroke attempted by Tharanga, short of length and outside off, looks to flay it towards point but his bat is nowhere near the ball, which sneaks between bat and his body to the keeper
looks to chop this one, bottom-edges it towards the keeper
length ball is worked towards midwicket
length and wide outside off, and this time it is Dilshan who bottom-edges it through to the keeper
short of length and just outside off, defended back towards the bowler
short and wide, Dilshan gets this on the middle of the bat, slapped powerfully towards backward point, but straight at the fielder
this time Dilshan gets it on the middle of the bat and in the gap, drives on the up past cover, not perfect timing but enough on that to reach the boundary
length ball is driven hard into the ground and towards extra cover
length ball is whipped towards midwicket for a couple

a wild shot from Tharanga, he hasn't middled too many today, so he wanted to release the pressure with a big shot, it was short of length and well outside off, Tharanga skipped down the track and looked to launch it over cover but doesn't connect
blocked back towards the bowler
Tharanga drives that in the air, but he gets it in the gap as well, this was again back of a length, but Tharanga gets it past extra cover for four
length ball outside off, driven towards mid-on, Ashwin dives to his left to stop that one, one-handed effort with his left hand
back of a length and on off stump, patted to the off side
defended off the front foot towards cover
pushed towards extra cover, Tharanga wanted one, Dilshan didn't, Raina was swooping in on that one, so Dilshan wisely sends Tharanga back
Dinda likes bowling the bouncer, here's his first of the day, Tharanga gets under it, doesn't bother getting the bat down, hold it above his head as he ducks
turned towards backward point
short again from Dinda, Tharanga was into position early to help it along to fine leg, they get a couple, Tharanga moves to 18 off 36
a mild appeal for lbw, that pitched outside leg
starts with a full ball that is pushed towards mid-off
round the wicket to the left-hander, full and on middle and off, defended to the off side
length ball outside off, guided down to third man for a single
length ball eased towards sweeper cover for a single
back of length ball is steered to third man for one more
a quiet first over from Kohli, just five off it, Tharanga cuts the final delivery to point
length ball on off stump, helped towards sweeper cover for a single
short of length ball, nurdled towards midwicket, a quick second is taken

the Dinda short ball again, Tharanga goes for the pull, it was top-edged by Tharanga, it went high but it went far as well, clears the backward square-leg boundary for six, Dinda has his hands on his head
one ball after a top-edge gets him a six, a crisp front-foot drive gets him none, straight to mid-off
sprays it down the leg side
back of a length ball on off stump, Tharanga whips it to midwicket
same length, just outside off, defended to the off side to end the over
full and outside off, Dilshan looks to thrash through the off side, he misses, Dhoni is standing up to the stumps, was there a thin edge, Kohli suggests there was, but Dhoni couldn't collect
defended to cover point by Dilshan
a full ball is driven towards long-off for a single
short ball outside off, looks to cut that one, but doesn't get hold of it properly, the ball rolls to the off side
short and wide, just within the permissible limit
clipped towards long-on for a single
starts with a length ball outside off, Sehwag bowling from round the wicket, defended to the off side
blocked off the front foot to the off side
a decent start this from Sehwag, not giving any room at all, Tharanga pats it back to the bowler
make that four dot balls in a row, blocked towards point
tapped back to the bowler
last ball is defended off the front foot, a maiden from Sehwag, now waiting for the "Dhoni is a genius" mails
Zaheer is back, Kohli was initially going to bowl, but zaheer came on once the Powerplay was signalled, length ball is slapped towards mid-off
short of length ball and just outside off, Dilshan pokes at it and misses
short of length ball just outside off, steered towards backward point
shorter and outside off, Dilshan comes down the track and slices the ball past a diving backward point
just outside off, Dilshan looks to force it through the off, thick inside-edge behind square leg
length ball slanting in towards the pads, helped behind square leg, Dinda has to get across to stop that, two runs to Sri Lanka
round the wicket to Dilshan, worked behind square leg
length ball outside off, slapped towards point
punched towards long-on for one more
length ball, spins in towards the pad, worked towards deep midwicket, Dilshan sprints back for the second
on the pads again, clipped to backward square leg

shorter from Ashwin, Tharanga slams that towards deep square leg, Irfan has to run across from deep midwicket to try stop that, he covers good ground and gets a hand on the ball but can't stop it rolling over the rope
on the pads and that is glanced very fine down the leg side, that's another boundary
Zaheer keeps it on the pads, defended towards square leg
length ball just outside off, punched back towards the bowler
nicely done by Tharanga, makes a bit of room and opens the face to get the ball just wide of the keeper for four

short of length and outside off, and that is slammed for another boundary, Tharanga finding some fluency here, he thumps that to the midwicket boundary and the decision to take the Powerplay early seems to be paying off
defends the last ball off the over to the off side
Dinda returns, after one over for Ashwin, first ball is blocked to the off side

Dinda has struck, once again he bowls it short, Dilshan goes for the pull, top edges it, unlike the Tharanga top edge that went for six, this one goes nowhere, swirls to the right of Dhoni, who settles under it and collects, bye bye Dilshan
defended back to the bowler
short of length and outside off, tapped in front of point
back of length ball outside off, guided towards sweeper cover for a single
short of length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler, just one run off the over, and the wicket of Dilshan, good stuff from Dinda
defended towards point this time
poked towards point for a single, Thirimanne is off the mark
full ball is driven towards mid-on, a dive there, but the fielder there -Zaheer- can only palm the ball towards long-off
Zaheer has more work to do as Tharanga punches it to mid-on
pushed to the off side for a single
sends that towards deep point, Irfan does the fielding, 35 off the Batting Powerplay
first ball is pushed towards point
pushed past the bowler for a single, that brings up Tharanga's single
another short ball from Dinda, batsman goes for the pull, doesn't connect well, the ball rolls towards short fine leg
short of length and well outside off, steered towards deep backward point
back of a length ball on off stump, defended to the off side
shortish and outside off, slapped towards point

Tharanga is stumped, Ashwin saw Tharanga skipping down the track, bowled it short, the ball didn't turn away after pitching, carried on in the same direction, Tharanga was looking for the spin and he misses the ball, he yards out of the crease, Dhoni has the ball, bails on the ground and both of Sri Lanka's openers are now dismissed
defended to the leg side
tossed up, length ball outside off, spinning away, defended off the front foot
full ball on the pad, defended to the leg side
length ball outside off, pushed towards point, 'Wait, wait, wait," says the batsman
a touch shorter and more flight, turns away from Thirimanne, guided towards backward point
a good-looking drive that from Chandimal, gets well forward and sends the ball towards extra cover
sends this one towards deep backward point, a thick outside edge as he looks to drive that one, over the head of a jumping gully fielder
length ball outside off is defended to the off side
a superb drive from Chandimal, on the up and he sends it past extra cover, gets a good stride forward as he plays that
short and well outside off, left alone
short of length ball just outside off, dropped towards cover and a quick single is taken
short of length ball, defended towards the bowler
length ball is driven along the ground towards long-on for a single
slapped towards deep backward point by Thirimanne
wide outside off, delicately pushed behind backward point
length ball on off stump, defended to the off side
outside off, left alone
width provided, batsman can't capitalise, stabs that to point
Irfan starts with a swinging ball down the leg side
length ball is blocked back towards the bowler
looks to power that through the off side, badly mistimed and that rolls towards cover
length ball is defended to the off side
length ball, this time Chandimal times it well but can't get the placement right, can't beat the extra cover fielder
Chandimal has made a good start here, that was on the pads, easy put away for Chandimal, whips it behind square leg for four, Irfan is disgusted with himself
defended towards cover to end the Powerplay, 22 for 1 in these five overs, a good phase for India
short of length and outside off, Thirimanne gets on his back foot and pushes the ball in front of point
spinning towards off stump, defended towards the bowler
length ball, a bit of an outside edge as the ball rolls towards cover
pitched up around off, eased down to long-on for a single
well outside off, sliced towards backward point
length ball on off stump, turns away from Thirimanne, defended to the off side off the front  foot
flighted ball is defended to midwicket
short and well outside off, forced towards backward point
more flight from Sehwag, helped towards midwicket
gives that delivery some air, paddled from outside off, Zaheer fumbles at fine leg, allowing the extra run
chopped to deep point for a single
waits on the back foot and guides it to third man for two more
punched to long-off for a single
Thirimanne makes a bit of run, opens the face to steer the ball to backward point, Chandimal wanted one, Thirimanne sends him back
slapped past point this time
flighted and full, powered back towards the bowler, who gets a finger on it but isn't able to stop it completely
length ball outside off, driven firmly to extra cover off the front foot
anything even slightly short is being cut by Thirimanne, he can't beat backward point
not the most elegant of shots from Thirimanne, looking to sweep that full one, in the air for a while but lands safely near long-on
blocked towards point

dropped by Virat Kohli, Thirimanne made room and drove that on the up towards short extra cover, came at waist height to Kohli's right, should have taken that, quite a straightforward chance, Thirimanne survives
steers this to point for a single, gets off strike
helps this down to fine leg
outside off, defended towards point
spinning away after pitching short of a length, defended to the off side
flighted and full, on the pads, worked towards midwicket, Dhoni tells the fielder that he shouldn't give away a second there, Raina doesn't
steered towards backward point
a touch short from Ashwin, slapped towards deep point for a single
flighted delivery, that didn't spin in, Chandimal plays for the offspin, he's beaten as the ball fizzes past the outside edge
short of length ball, Thirimanne comes down the track and awkwardly fends that towards square leg, Dhoni does the fielding
goes for the big shot, charges out and swings it towards midwicket, the substitute Rahane does the fielding
whipped towards deep square leg
length ball that Thirimanne opts to play off the back foot, chopped towards point
Chandimal using his feet again, works it towards midwicket
whipped towards deep midwicket for a single, Sehwag doing a decent job here, four overs for 18 runs
pitched up and almost chipped back towards the bowler, to his left and down to long-on for a single
worked to deep square leg, Sri Lanka's 150 comes up
cross-batted hit towards midwicket, 50 stand comes up

Tiwary is overjoyed, as he strikes in his first over, not an exceptional delivery, was a long hop that Chandimal could have hit anywhere he wanted, Chandimal just picks out the man at square leg, he's gone for 28, a slice of luck for India
shortish ball outside off, Mahela slices it behind point to get off the mark
eased towards long-on for a single to end the over

the part-timers get another wicket, the biggest one of the innings now, Mahela looks to scoop a full ball, ends up lobbing it towards Dhoni, who accepts, umpire doesn't take long to raise the finger and send Mahela on his way, very early in Mahela's innings to be attempting that adventurous shot, SL slip to 155 for 4
length ball on legstump, defended to the leg side
down the leg side
full ball is blocked towards midwicket
length ball on legstump, more defence from Mathews
full ball on the pads, nudged towards square leg
more forward defence, and that ends a superb over from Sehwag, one run and the wicket of Mahela
full ball is thumped down to long-on for a single
length ball outside off, a hint of turn away, Mathews blocks off the front foot, he usually takes his time to get going
punched off the front foot towards extra cover
shorter this time, spinning away, Mathews wait and taps it towards point
way down the leg side, not much of a chance for Dhoni to stop that
short and outside off, slapped to cover
on the pads and that is worked to midwicket
flighted ball is sent to short cover
flighted, Thirimane comes down the track and eases it to long-off
Mathews waits for the ball on the back foot, opens the face at he last moment, cleverly worked past the keeper
defended back towards the bowler
dead-batted by Mathews

and does he have another wicket? Thirimanne looks to sweep a shortish ball, off the thigh pad and it loops up to Dhoni, did it hit his bat after the thigh pad, very tough to tell even after the replays, India were convinced, the umpire wasn't
eased towards long-on for a single
waits on the back foot and helps it towards sweeper cover
length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side
on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
power from Mathews, that was bit short from Sehwag, he forces that through cover for four, off the back foot and well placed as well
pitched up this time, on the pads, drilled towards long-on
Sri Lanka have decided they have had enough of being watchful against Sehwag, Thirimanne swipes this towards deep midwicket
length ball just outside off, eased towards point
helped towards fine leg for a single
that one doesn't spin, goes straight on, Thirimanne defends
length ball is hit back towards the bowler
tossed up and well wide of off stump, left alone
defended towards point
flighted and on a length, slapped towards point
length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
Dhoni is a genius, confirmed, a maiden from Tiwary, the last ball is defended towards cover
defended to the square leg
once more clipped to midwicket
defended back to the bowler
spinning towards the pads, blocked down the track
Rohit gets this to spin sharply, short leg would have taken that, there's no short leg in place, the ball lands safely, just one off the over, Sri Lanka's innings flatlining
full ball outside leg stump, worked towards square leg
shorter this time, muscled towards sweeper cover
half-tracker outside leg stump, should have been smashed for four, instead it is worked for a couple to deep square leg
another dot ball, defended to the leg side
full and on off stump, squeezed towards point
pitched up and that is driven towards long-off for a single
full ball outside off, clipped to square leg
shorter and quicker, spinning in, helped towards deep backward square leg
length ball outside off, defended to the off side
length ball on off is paddled towards fine leg for a couple
short of length ball, slapped towards sweeper for a single
paddled towards deep backward square leg for a single

Manoj Tiwary has a huge grin on his face, and why not, he's just got his second wicket, a length ball spinning away, Mathews decided it was time to get a move on, he skipped out and launched the ball towards long-off, didn't get enough power on that, long-off takes the catch
full ball is driven towards long-on for a single
reverse-swept by Mendis, his first delivery, bottom-edged towards square leg
works it to cover for a single
length ball is defended back towards the bowler
another terrific over from Tiwary, India has death bowling problems? only two of that over, and the wicket of Mathews
first ball by a specialist in a while and it is whacked for four, powerfully swept to the square leg boundary
flighted length ball on legstump, defended towards square leg, Dhoni fields
full ball is reverse-swept, can't time it, the ball goes towards extra cover
punched towards long-on, thirimanne was coasting when he took the first, Mendis wanted two, a direct hit from the deep would have caught Thirimanne short by a couple of yards
goes for the reverse-sweep, misses and is struck just outside the line, massive lbw appeal turned down
worked to midwicket for a single to end the over, 200 comes up
whipped towards long-off for a single
nearly another one for Tiwary, that was a flighted ball outside the leg stump, Thirimanne didn't have the room to swing his arms freely, in the air for a while but lands well wide of long-on
slapped towards deep point
Mendis skips away from leg stump and pokes the ball past off stump and the keeper for a single, Mendis showing some enterprise here, lacking in the Sri Lankan innings over the past half hour
down the track and defended
helped along to long-on for a singe to end the over
full ball heading down leg, the batsman had shuffled down the leg side, defended towards cover
full ball is worked towards cover for a single
length ball is reverse-swept to Zaheer to backward point
poor delivery, quicker ball down the leg side, helped past short fine for four, Mendis moves along to 16 off 13
length ball, Mendis pokes it towards the off side
full toss is thumped towards long-on for a single

third for Tiwary! Mendis looked to reverse-sweep, he's bowled by a flighted legbreak, Tiwary can do no wrong here, send him up the order today when India bat, this is his best bowling figures in ODI and domestic one-dayers as well
spins down the leg side
flatter ball and that is slapped to backward point
tossed up and that is clipped to midwicket
comes down the track and clips it to midwicket
slapped to deep backward point for a single

Tiwary's day gets better and better, he's got his fourth now! Perera looks to clobber the ball into orbit, he hits it high but not long enough, Raina gets under it at midwicket, and does well to pouch that one, he had plenty of ground to cover, judges it perfectly
Herath looks to sweep but is struck on the pads ,outside off, a mild lbw appeal
Herath plays inside the line of that one, struck on the pads
flighted ball is slapped to short cover
flighted ball and they get a leg-bye after Herath misses the sweep
more flight, Thirimanne now goes for the reverse-sweep, can't connect properly, off the toe end, to the keeper

bowled 'im, Sri Lanka's implosion continues, Thirimanne charges down the track and looks to force the ball through the off side, the ball went straight on, doesn't spin away, he misses and that crashes into the top of leg stump
flighted ball is worked to short fine leg

could have had a five-for there, that pitched on middle on leg and spun towards off, Herath went for the sweep, misses and is struck on the thigh pad, height was not a problem, but the umpire probably though that was missing off, close call that, looked heading for off
whacked to midwicket for a single
Malinga shows how to hit them, clobbers a pitched up ball over midwicket, Mathews and Perera tried but holed out
looks to muscle that through wide one through the off side, doesn't connect
flighted ball, Malinga wanted to send that into orbit, bottom edges it towards slip
another wicket? no, that swipe from Herath was in the air for a long time, but still landed safe at deep midwicket
worked to extra cover this time
overpitched ball, cramping up Malinga who is looking to swing every ball now, squeezed towards the leg side
full ball is defended to the leg side, Sehwag goes up in appeal for the lbw, Dhoni is quickly after the ball as the batsmen sneak a run, Dhoni's throw is  way off target though
swiped towards deep square leg for a single
pitched up and a tailender's slog towards deep midwicket
Herath again looks to swipe, misses and is struck on the pad, the ball rolls back towards Dhoni
for a moment Tiwary thought he had his fifth, Herath charged out and swung it towards deep midwicket, ball was in the air for a long time, but lands between long-on and midwicket
in the air again, swept again, the ball lands short of the man in the deep, three more deliveries, can he get a five-for?
Malinga murders that to the midwicket boundary, he charged out, Tiwary sent it short but that doesn't stop Malinga, who swings it for six
down the track and clubbed towards long-on

whoah! that is the shot of the innings, Herath finishes off the innings in style, he's a great tailender to watch, skips down the track and demolishes that one over wide long-on for another six, an expensive final over but that isn't going to wipe the smile off Tiwary's face

inn2.comm: full and swinging down the leg side, off the pads and towards square leg
full again, fired in towards middle and off, defended down the track
short of length ball just outside off, drops it at his feet, wants a single but Sehwag doesn't
back of a length ball and on leg stump, clipped to square leg

bowled 'im, a swinging yorker homes into the base of middle stump, Gambhir was terrific in the last couple of games, he's gone for a duck, Gambhir looking to push that down the ground but misses, the famous Malinga yorker does the job
shortish ball, moving away, Kohli shoulders arms, the crowd is buzzing after that wicket
back of length ball on off stump, Sehwag opens the face and guides the ball towards point
length ball which Sehwag looks to flick but is struck on the pads
a wild delivery down the leg side, seemed destined for five wides but Chandimal puts in a dive to get a glove on that
outside off and Sehwag lets it through to the keeper
length ball on off stump, solidly defended to the off side
lovely shot from Sehwag, not a power-hit, just chipped over the bowler's head, no footwork from him, swings the bat and gets a boundary
another boundary, Sehwag chases a wide ball outside off, looking to flail it through the off side, gets a thick top edge to the third man boundary
Malinga starts with a shortish ball outside off, Kohli happy to leave
good delivery from Malinga, swinging towards off stump, length ball is defended to the off side
digs it in short, on legstump, Kohli swivels as he pulls that down towards deep backward square leg
pitched up and outside off, down towards third man for a single
short ball down the leg side, wide
short of length ball and outside off, Kohli happy to leave
short of length ball, Kohli defends off the back foot to the off side
lovely stroke from Sehwag, shifts his weight on the back foot as he sees the ball is slightly short, carves it through cover for four more
shortish and outside off, Sehwag slaps it towards point, Dilshan moves quickly to his left to stop that
poked towards cover for a single, initial call was 'No, no, no' but then Sehwag called him through
jagged in sharply that one, more movement than we saw when India were bowling, Sehwag can't get his bat anywhere near that, struck on the pads but that was going to miss leg stump
jags in from back of a length, outside off, Sehwag looks to thrash that through the off side, the ball goes through between the bat and pad

Sehwag in a bit of bother again as Perera gets the ball to nip in once again, on off stump, Sehwag defends from the crease, for a moment he's not sure where the ball has gone, but then he sees it rolls away in the direction of short leg
short of length and outside off, guided towards third man for a single
length ball on off stump, Sehwag opens the face and runs that down to third man for one more
what a hit from Kohli, a short ball just outside off, hooked towards deep midwicket almost carried all the way to the rope, lands just inside
short of length ball on off, solid forward defensive from Kohli
full and on the pads, whipped down to fine leg for a single, fielder had to move around quickly
beaten outside off, Sehwag searches for that one outside off, and it zips past the outside edge
back of a length ball, helped along to fine leg for a couple
plenty of seam movement, but most of it after the ball has passed the stumps, Kohli wasn't interested in that outside off delivery
length ball on the pads, defended towards mid-on
not much power from Sehwag, just careful placement, a short of length ball outside off, Sehwag opens the face and helps it past point for four
careful forward defence from Sehwag, not a line you'll hear often
superb from Sehwag, a good length ball is firmly driven through cover for four more, India speed along to 38
shortish ball outside off, left alone by Kohli
short of length, pitching on middle and moving towards off, solid defence
pitched up and that is pushed towards cover for a quick single
shortish ball cramps up Sehwag, he awkwardly fends that one towards short leg, for the second ball in a row, Sehwag had to scramble a quick run, a direct hit and Sehwag was out
Kohli is struck on the ribs, he was looking to clip that short of length ball towards square leg, but that thuds into his ribs, the Colombo crowd loves it, roar their approval
swinging away, pitching on a length and just outside off, defended off the front foot
short of length ball outside off, eased towards deep point
short of length ball is whipped towards deep midwicket by Sehwag, a controlled shot from Sehwag there
back of a length ball on off stump, opens the face and punches that off the back foot towards cover
another boundary, India onto 48 now, shortish from Mathews, not the best of lengths at his pace, Sehwag slices that over cover for four more
outside off and that is guided towards third man for a single
short of length ball, blocked to the off side
Sehwag wafts outside off, a short of length ball that  moves away a hint, Sehwag looks to punch it through cover, beaten,Sehwag then practises letting the ball go
much fuller, on middle stump, Sehwag bends his knees and defends towards cover
beaten once more, second time in three deliveries, Sehwag wasn't playing an expansive shot this time, opening the face though, looking to guide it to third man and doesn't connect
length ball on off and middle, worked towards cover point, India get to 50
another bouncer and Kohli goes for the hook again, that was quick from Malinga, too high for Kohli, a mild appeal for caught-behind from Chandimal
shortish and wide, Kohli has to reach out to get to that, slapped over cover, doesn't connect too well, end of an action-filled over from Malinga
short of length ball, Sehwag pushes it towards cover, plays it away from his body

Sehwag is gone, substitute Senanayake who dropped Raina in the last match takes the catch at short cover, Sehwag was looking to whip that one to leg side, a short of length ball, gets a leading edge, a diving catch, well done by the substitute
survives his first ball, no golden duck, a length ball outside off, left alone
length ball is middled back to the bowler
beats the outside edge, nearly gone there, Rohit looking to drive to the off side ,the ball moved away and past the bat
blocked back down the track
clipped to midwicket for a single
length ball outside off, left alone by Rohit, this is a good situation for Rohit to be batting, he has plenty of time, the required-rate is well under control

is that a run-out? off the pad to midwicket, Kohli wants the single but is rightly sent back (after Rohit initially said yes), Kohli returns and has to stretch to make his ground, and he beats the direct hit from Mendis by one frame, that would have been a massive blow for India
cautiously left alone, raising the bat over his head to a length ball outside off
defended to the off side
down the leg side, Rohit would have loved to get a bit of bat on that and help it along for four, he doesn't, it is a wide
length ball is pushed towards point, Dilshan is alert there, onto the ball quickly to prevent the single, Rohit still on zero
defended towards the off side by Kohli, who has looked assured right from the start today
pushed towards mid-on by Kohli
punched towards cover off the front foot
back of a length ball is pushed towards mid-on, who is on the circle, a quick run taken
the pressure seemed to have got to Rohit, a heave over mid-off after nine balls on zero, that could so easily have gone to the fielder, sails over his head instead, Rohit lives on, gets a couple
gets behind the line and defends that one
Kohli whips it towards deep square leg for a single
back of a length on off stump, good line and length, defended by Rohit
length ball on the pads, Rohit likes the freebies, helped along towards deep square leg

Rohit Sharma has wasted another chance, he's gone for 4, he doesn't want to go, that should end his international career temporarily, surely, that was a length ball that was angling in, Rohit looked to work it to the leg side, he missed, hits the pads, that was going on to hit leg stump
defended to the off side
outside off and that is left alone by Tiwary
gets on the back foot and defends it to the off side
back of a length ball, forced towards cover where Mendis moves across quickly to field
steered toward deep backward point for a single
back of a length ball on off stump, Tiwary jumps across and defends towards square leg
nearly nicked that through, not the most assured of strokes, a back of length ball outside off, Tiwary flirts with it and misses
jags in from back of a length, more confidently played by Tiwary, getting behind the line and defending
blocked confidently off the back foot by Kohli
mistimes a pull, it was a shortish ball, it rolls towards mid-on
length ball on middle, Kohli whips it towards square leg
Tiwary remains on zero, defended towards point
superbly bowled, the ball leaves the batsman after pitching on off, Tiwary looking to defend down the track and is beaten
first runs for Tiwary, from a freebie, sliding down the leg side, helped along to fine leg for four

Kohli could have been out twice on that delivery, a shortish ball on legstump, tucked it to the leg side, almost looped to the fielder there, but landed short, there was a huge mix-up between the batsmen, they eventually decide to go for the single, a direct hit and Kohli was gone
good length delivery is defended off the front foot
jagged back in and that is defended to square leg
one of the rare occasions today that Perera gets the ball to seam away, Tiwary is beaten once again, a nervous start by him
pitched up and just outside off, Tiwary flicks it to the square leg boundary
bouncer to end the over, Tiwary ducks
Pradeep oversteps, a length ball heading for off stump, blocked to the off side
full ball, slower one too, on the pads, Kohli wanted to thrash that to the leg side, inside-edged onto the pads
length ball slanting in towards leg stump, defended towards midwicket
another no-ball, inexcusable, free-hits in the Powerplay, Kohli pulls to midwicket for two
again Kohli can't make the most of the free-hit, he wanted to launch that out of the park, the ball high and not very long, over the bowler, Perera gets under it and drops the catch
shortish and well outside off, Tiwary allows that through to the keeper
full ball on offstump, clipped towards deep midwicket, a stylish shot from Tiwary
well outside off, Tiwary happy to leave
length ball outside off, Kohli looking to swat it through the offside, the ball sneaks between the bat and pad
inside-edge this time, looking to play that to the off side, the ball dribbles towards midwicket
defended back towards the bowler
outside off and that is left alone
sends this towards square leg for a single, inside-edged again
short ball is pulled towards midwicket by Kohli
short and wide, Pradeep straying there and Kohli capitalises, slapped through covers for four

angled in towards the body, clipped towards midwicket, and they push for the second, as the fielder had to rush in from the deep, the throw is towards the non-striker's end, bowler can't collect and the backing-up is tardy, four overthrows, so six off the ball
defended to the leg side off the back foot
length ball on middle, pushed with more force to deep square leg, only a single this time
length ball on off and middle, blocked off the front foot
full ball just outside off, dug out towards the bowler
Mathews starts the over with a short of length ball just outside off, defended
outside off and eased towards cover for a single
length ball angling in towards the pads, pushed to mid-on
short of length ball just outside off, tucked towards square leg
short of length and outside off, defended towards midwicket
outside off and that is left alone
outside off and that is left alone
that goes straight on from Herath, solid defence
punched back, Herath dives to his left to stop that
punched off the back foot towards long-off
length ball is chipped wide of long-on, Tiwary gets a couple, hitting against the spin there
blocked off the front foot
punched off the back foot towards cover
off the back foot and punched towards cover, a poor piece of fielding there for Perera, lets it through and Sanjay Manjrekar points out on commentary that this is Tiwary's first runs on the off side
defended to the leg side
length ball outside off, left alone
back of length ball is pushed towards cover
shuffles across the stumps and defends to the leg side
sliding in towards the pads, worked towards midwicket
spins in, Tiwary was looking to cut that one, that one went on with the arm, Tiwary was looking for the turn, that struck him outside leg, so no lbw chance
eased towards mid-off for a single
length ball punched past short extra cover
an appeal for lbw, looking to tuck that one to the leg side, that was sliding down the leg side, no chance of an lbw
stretches forward and defends to the off side
bowled on off stump, driven from the crease towards cover
driven to long off for a single
a deft paddle towards fine leg, got down on one knee and glanced it past the keeper
that looked plumb and the umpire raised his finger after quite a while. The Sri Lankans were so sure. The ball pitched middle and went straight on, Manoj Tiwary missed the sweep and that was that
dragged short, flat outside off stump, Raina has room to sit back and hit the ball through extra cover
played back towards the bowler, Mendis dives to his left and makes the save
driven off the front foot towards wide long-on

a huge roar for caught behind from the Sri Lankans but umpire Dharmasena shakes his head. Dharmasena then has a word with Chandimal, who was charging the umpire. Raina had pushed forward to defend and the ball slid across the left-hander. Looked like a faint edge
defended on the leg side
comes out of his crease and drives to long on
goes back and works the ball from middle stump through midwicket
full ball is eased towards long-off for a single
full toss is mistimed towards mid-off
overpitched and driven inside-out towards mid-off
defended towards point by Raina
spins away, short and outside off, thrashed towards deep point
slapped towards deep backward point
sliding in towards the pads, helped towards midwicket by Kohli, who moves on to 49
overpitched and that is pushed towards deep point, both Raina and Kohli are very quick between the wickets, they get two
spins away, defended to the off side
pushed towards short cover
inside-edged on to the pads, the ball rolls towards point
leans forward and clips it to square leg
punched firmly towards short cover, a diving stop prevents a run
takes a step down the track and drives it along the ground to mid-on, nicely done by Raina
another half-century for Kohli, the man is a machine, works this towards cover and gets a single, India's most valuable ODI batsman now?
clipped off the back foot towards square leg
sends that away towards deep midwicket
defended back towards the bowler
another single towards cover, Kohli working the ball around easily
defended off the front foot to the leg side
more front foot defence from Raina
gets on the back foot and worked towards square leg by Raina
short of length ball, drilled towards long-on for one more
single towards point to end the over
effortless from Raina, he's in form as well, dances down the track and punches it between the bowler and mid-off
stretches forward and drives towards short cover
full and outside off, again Thirimanne at short cover has to field, he can't stop it cleanly
overpitched, Kohli looks to power that through the off side, mistimed towards cover
gets on the back foot and swats that towards deep midwicket
stretches forward and drives, but can't get it past extra cover
helped off the pads down to fine leg
gets deep in the crease and another easy single towards long-off
single to long-on this time
swatted towards extra cover, that was a touch wide and he loves hitting it through extra cover, gets on the back foot, makes room and powers it for four
blocked back towards the bowler
driven off the front foot towards cover for one more
spins away after pitching outside off, a back foot swat through cover, Malinga chases and gets a hand on that but there was too much power on that for him
thumps this towards extra cover for one more
eased off the back foot towards long-off for an ambled single
pitching outside leg, Kohli again gets on the back foot and tucks it to square leg
a false shot there, Raina looking for the single to long-off again, inside-edged to the left of the bowler
down the leg side, off the pad to the keeper
length ball into the pads, that was astonishing shot from Kohli, an utterly effortless on-drive, I though it would be a single to wide long-on but that races to the boundary

that could easily have been a run-out, both batsmen were almost at the same end, Kohli punched that towards backward point, Dilshan leaps and fields that, Raina was charging through assuming it would get past Dilshan, Kohli wasn't going for the run, Raina had to race back, the throw missed though
on middle, helped along to fine leg

dropped, Raina leading a charmed life here, could have been out twice this over, this was a sitter put down by Mahela at first slip, Pradeep's bad luck continues, a thick edge carries at a nice height to Mahela, not too quick either, can't put these down
pushed to cover for a quick single
outside off and that is edged towards third man for a single
slapped off the back foot towards deep point by Kohli, they come back for the second
length ball, not much turn here for Mendis, defended off the front foot
punched off the back foot to mid-on, dropped a bit short by Mendis

all going wrong for Sri Lanka here, length ball outside off, Raina plays it towards point, they risk a single, a direct hit and Raina was gone, the throw misses and worse for Sri Lanka, it goes away for four more overthrows
back foot slap towards cover
charges down the track and drills it towards long-on, couldn't get as much power as he wanted on that, so gets only a single
terrific delivery, even with Kohli in red-hot form Pradeep beats him, that was back of a length and just outside off, a hint of away movement after bouncing

huge appeal for lbw, Dharmasena says not out, India living dangerously here, this nips in a touch, pitching outside off and angling in, Kohli looking to play to the leg side, he missed and is stuck high on the pads, too high? replays show that would have hit the top of leg, lucky escape for Kohli, that hit the top of Kohli's left pad
helped to midwicket for a single
short of length and blocked to the bowler
defended off the front foot by Kohli
just outside off, eased towards cover for one more
short of length ball is pushed towards cover by Kohli
short of length once more, just outside off, blocked off the front foot
fuller and on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on by Kohli
short of length ball outside off, driven towards extra cover by Kohli
shorter from Malinga, eased towards wide mid-on for a single
full ball outside off, Raina plays it off the back foot, inside-edged towards the leg side for a single
steps forward and drives on the up towards mid-off
shortish ball outside off, guided towards backward point
full and outside off, driven firmly towards short cover
length ball outside off and that is lofted towards deep point
driven towards mid-on for a single
shot from Raina, blasts this over the bowler's head, just outside off short of a length, clobbers it with a flat bat, that goes a long way
short of length and on the pads, clipped towards square leg for a single
[pings it in short, Raina jumps to get on top of the bounce, guided towards backward point
length ball outside off, slapped towards deep midwicket, two more to Kohli
a yorker on offstump, twirled towards midwicket by Kohli
Malinga aiming for the toes, Raina tucks the ball towards square leg for a single
short ball, pulled by Kohli, doesn't bother keeping it on the ground, lands well wide of midwicket
not the greatest start for Perera, short of length and angling across, some width there, Raina uses it, launching that towards sweeper cover for four
shortish ball on the pads, Raina pulls it towards short fine
length ball just outside off, guided down to third man
defended towards point
length ball is contemptuously swatted over to the wide long-on boundary, this is turning into a cruise for India

brilliant from Kohli, he skips down the track and gets to the pitch, a pile driver of a shot sends that sailing towards the sightscreen, six more, the 100 stand is up and Kohli isn't too far from his 100 either
low full toss, Raina deftly places that wide of point, doesn't go all the way to the rope, but time enough to get three, that's 50 for Raina, his fourth in six innings

century no 13 for Kohli, he scoring one every other day it seems, short form Malinga, pulled behind square leg for four, no cuss words as he celebrates the hundred, calmly removes his helmets, twirls the bat and gives it a kiss, a big smile on his face, no anger
length ball on off stump, defended to the off side
way wide of off stump

dropped, Sri Lanka haven't helped themselves in this match, Kohli top-edges a pull, the ball is in the air a long time, Pradeep has plenty of time to get under that one, and he spills it, another regulation catch put down
full and on middle, superb shot from Kohli, gets his feet out of the way of that and slams it past square leg
wide outside off, forced towards sweeper cover for a couple, India racing towards a series win here
full ball is worked towards deep midwicket by Raina
Kohli moves onto the back foot and beyond leg stump, eases the ball to long-on for a single
chipped towards long-off, in the air but a controlled shot
on the pads and that is tucked to midwicket, India 21 away now
fired down the leg side, a thin edge down towards fine leg
a four to extra cover, jumping down the track, making a bit of room, and powers it to the extra cover boundary, a shot he played repeatedly in his 183 against Pakistan in the Asia Cup
Kohli is in a hurry, once more he skips down the track and launches that to the left of the bowler for four more, down to 11 now for India
defended off the back foot by Kohli
'Two, two, two," Kohli shouts as he drives inside-out towards extra cover, Malinga races across and gets a boot in the way to keep Kohli to two
more power from Kohli, all along the ground as he hammers that to the extra cover boundary, Sri Lanka have no answer to him
the records this man is piling up is astonishing, already a 1000 runs in ODIs this year, the final ball of the over is smashed to the deep midwicket boundary, scores are level
defended to the bowler

it's over, India take the series 3-1, Raina launches that over extra cover to confirm the win, superb stuff from Kohli and Raina, Raina jumps and punches the air, Kohli picks up a stump as a souvenir, shakes hands with the Sri Lankans, that is India's 400th ODI victory
